thread.title: Corel Announces New Chief Operating Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Corel Announces New Chief Operating Officer
text:
OTTAWA, March 06, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Corel announces that it has named Prasannaa Ganesan as Chief Operating Officer. Prasannaa joined Corel in 2010 as Director of Operations for WinZip and most recently held the title of Corel Executive Vice President of Operations.
Leading Corel’s business operations, product development, and expense management, Prasannaa is responsible for a number of functional areas including information technology, research and development, customer and technical support, release management, and manufacturing. His teams deliver an efficient and scalable foundation that enables departments across the company to achieve Corel's strategic goals.
Prasannaa plays a key role in supporting the success of Corel’s M&A activities from due diligence through post-acquisition integration. Respected for his strong sense of fiscal responsibility, he is credited with dramatically increasing profitability across all of Corel’s business groups.
Prior to Corel, Prasannaa served as the Program and Delivery Director at Versata and Trilogy. He pursued his Masters of Science in Electrical engineering from North Carolina Agricultural & Technical State University, following a Bachelor of Engineering from Shanmugha Arts, Science, Technology, and Research Academy.
“With his background in engineering, operations, and delivery, Prasannaa is recognized for the unique combination of technical expertise and business acumen that he’s brought to Corel’s business for more than seven years,” said Patrick Nichols, CEO of Corel. “In this new COO role, Prasannaa’s steadfast leadership will continue to be invaluable as we drive Corel’s next stage of growth.”
About Corel
Corel is one of the world's top software companies. Our mission is simple: to help people achieve new levels of creativity, productivity, and success. For more information, please visit www.corel.com .
